title: You Can Now Listen To Justice Scalia Call Obamacare 'SCOTUScare' Over And Over
text: Every major Supreme Court decision has two parts: a written opinion and an oral announcement. The former is made public immediately, but the latter is only accessible to the few who are gathered in the courtroom on the day a decision is
